title: Watch Face One
summary: Interactive and customizable!Analog, digital, battery, date, weather and more!
description: Simple and modern analog watch face.  Features:• Location• Weather• Screen timeout• Colors customization• 12/24h configuration• Battery control• Date Compatible with:• LG G/R Watch• LG Urbane Watch• Samsung Gear Live• Motorola Moto 360• Asus ZenWatch• Sony Smartwatch 3 Coming soon:• Animated interactions!
descriptionHTML:
Simple and modern analog watch face.

Features:
• Location
• Weather
• Screen timeout
• Colors customization
• 12/24h configuration
• Battery control
• Date


Compatible with:
• LG G/R Watch
• LG Urbane Watch
• Samsung Gear Live
• Motorola Moto 360
• Asus ZenWatch
• Sony Smartwatch 3

Coming soon:
• Animated interactions!
comments: Really nice I like this one a lot! Thanks for the color update, it looks even better now.
Good looking and simple face. About the only thing I'd ask for is a 12 hour time option.
One of the very few 3rd party watchface that looks really cool on moto360
Simple and classy Absolutely love this watchface, it looks great and isn't a battery hog either
